document.full_text: egypt thursday took another step toward erasing the legacy of deposed president hosni mubarak by ordering his name, and that of his family, removed from public institutions across the nation.
document.title: egypt orders "pharaoh" mubarak's name stripped off
lines_and_colors: egypt thursday took another step toward erasing the legacy of deposed president hosni mubarak by ordering his name, and that of his family, removed from public institutions across the nation.
